trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Concord
There were no other sightings in Concord on or around February 26th 2002
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving back from a summer camp in the sierra foot hills with my dad, hewas driving. It was uneventful and I turned my head to look at the Navalstation in Concord, when I noticed the object. I had seen many before, butalways looked closer and saw they were planes or helocopters. I had been out ofthe loop of reading and watching Documentarys about UFOs so when I saw it I waskind of calm and noncelont about it. The object it self was like a fisbee witha slight indentation on the top, it was refective goldish-silver color and wasjust hovering, soon I realzed it was slowly decending and moving back and forth.I looked away many times and it always was there when I looked back, but when mydad started to talk to me I looked away, when I looked back it was gone I lookedaround the area and didnt see a trace of the object. I simply shruged it off,but didnt tell any one about it, I dont know if my father saw it.
